# Travel C Sri Lanka

## About
Travel C Sri Lanka is the #1 trusted taxi, tour, and air ticket service provider in Southern Sri Lanka. We specialize in airport transfers, private tours, and round trips across the island.

## Services
- **Taxi Service**: Reliable transport for airport drops/pickups, city tours, and long-distance travel.
- **Tour Packages**: Curated experiences ranging from 5 to 18 days, covering Sigiriya, Kandy, Ella, Galle, and more.
- **Air Tickets**: Assistance with booking flights.
- **Vehicle Fleet**: Suzuki WagonR, Toyota Prius, Toyota KDH Vans, and Honda Shuttle (A/C and Non-A/C options).

## Contact Information
- **WhatsApp**: [+94 71 222 0002](https://wa.me/94712220002)
- **Email**: travelclanka@gmail.com
- **Location**: Southern Province, Sri Lanka
- **Website**: https://travelclanka.com/

- **Contact**: https://travelclanka.com/contact.html

## Service Areas
Unawatuna, Galle, Mirissa, Weligama, Hikkaduwa, Bentota, Tangalle, Colombo, Negombo, Hambantota, Ella, Kandy, Sigiriya, Nuwara Eliya.

## Core Values
- Reliability
- Safety
- Comfort
- 24/7 Availability
